comments: BEST TEACHER I HAVE EVER HAD! you learn so much and you can\'t not get an A! PRS points are literally half your grade so go to class. TAKE MATT!

I\'ve took both World Music and Roots with Matt. Both were easy but I actually learned a lot. He\'s also actually interested in what students think which is cool. PRS points make up most of the grade so attendance is a must though.
Really great class. Matt is super interesting and is actually funny in class. I was literally laughing out loud. I was not intending to enjoy this class but it was great.
Good class. Interested in what students think.
Matt is really knowledgeable and interested in the subject. Essays are easy and one multiple choice test that he gives you ahead of time to study with. I would definitely take him again.

Matt is a great teacher. Will never forget his class.The guy loves music and has an apparent passion for it. It shows in his work. The class consists of easy fun powerpoints. You write 2-3 short paragraphs and one writing assignment thats easy. The tests are very easy because he gives you a studyguide. Take him

Love him!! Such a sweet guy and good teacher! Makes class interesting and is really passionate about music. He helps you if you need anything! Go to class because the PRS points are what help your grade. I would def. recommend taking this class hes amazing!

SUCH A GREAT GUY! hes so easy you get atleast 3 points eveyrday for going and hes extremely interesting! i have NO interest in music but this class is beyond an easy A! a few essays but he pretty much just goes on word count! HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!
He is the nicest, most sincere teacher I have had. His class is very interesting and fun!! Yes it is at 8 am but it is well worth it for an easy and entertaining class!!! Take his class!!!
Awesome class! Yes it\'s an easy A, but he keeps it very interesting and fun. The only 8 A.M. class I actually look forward to going to. Take him!
Matt is a great guy! super funny and quirky. Easy A and you will have fun too.

I would definitely recommend this class to anyone who asks for an interesting easy music class! Matt is really fun great guy and knows a lot about music in different cultures around the world.He is young too. He makes learning really fun and i always wanted to go to class even though we didn\'t have to. I would take any class that Matt teaches!

This class is perfect for anyone who needs an easy A. Music isn\'t t exactly my cup of tea until I was introduced to the fabulousness that is Matt Morin. He is laid back and very open. He is also a total laugh, watching him utilize the entire classroom as his teaching stage is incentive enough to go to class. If the easy A\'s aren\'t enough as it is.

OMG!!!!..if you need an easy A for 3 credit hours, this is the class to take. He\'s sooo cool! He\'s so diverse and he is so aware of everything that goes on in various cultures...he makes the class fun and easy...plenty of opportunities for extra credit.so far i have 2 100s without a book!
